query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM time_series) as time_series_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sources) as sources_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM documents) as documents_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM economic_events) as events_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM research_publications) as publications_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM datasets) as datasets_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users) as users_count;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4DB9hJWqLzCzJpD.4ae2ba9639dc --database XodoyKMzPdFiKkVj3QFTGK --execute SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM time_series) as time_series_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sources) as sources_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM documents) as documents_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM economic_events) as events_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM research_publications) as publications_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM datasets) as datasets_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users) as users_count;
